manualTitle: User Manual: Traffic Congestion CRUD - SP
welcome: Welcome to the traffic congestion data management system. This manual explains the application's main features.
syncDesc: The `Synchronize 2018 Data` button connects to the SP City Hall's public API and starts downloading all congestion records (over 160,000).
syncProgress: Progress Bar: Next to the button, a progress bar will display the download status, which may take a few minutes.
syncDb: Database: The data is saved to a local database (lentidao_2018.db) so you can perform fast queries without needing an internet connection.
filterDesc: Once the data is synchronized, you can use the filter section to find specific records.
filterDia: Day: Allows you to select a specific date from the calendar.
filterExpressa: Expressway: Allows filtering by road type (A, E, Empty, or All).
filterCorredor: Corridor: Allows searching for a specific corridor name (e.g., 'Marginal TietÃª').
filterSentido: Direction: Allows searching for a specific direction (e.g., 'Castelo/A.Senna').
filterButton: `Search` Button: After setting your filters, click 'Search' to display the results in the table.
crudDesc: The system allows for complete manipulation (Create, Read, Update, Delete) of the records in your local database.
crudAdd: `Add New`: Opens a new window for you to manually insert a new congestion record into the database.
crudDelete: `Delete Selected`: To use, first click a row in the table to select it. Then, click this button to permanently remove the record from the database (a confirmation will be required).
crudEdit: `Edit Selected`: To use, first click a row in the table. Clicking this button will open a new window with that record's data, allowing you to make changes and save them.
helpDesc: `Help / Manual` Button: Opens this user manual in a new window for quick reference.
